Github Prerequisite:

  • Feature Request Template
    • Feature Description
    • Use Case
    • Proposed Solution
    • Workflow Diagram
    • Action Items
    • Potential Challenges / Requirements
    • Additional Notes
  • Bug Report
    • Possible Action Items
    • Sample Screenshots (Optional)
  • Bug Report - Detailed
    • Describe the bug
    • To Reproduce
    • Expected behavior
    • Screenshots
    • Desktop (please complete the following information)
    • Smartphone (please complete the following information)
    • Additional context

Lens Platform API:

  • Add Team
    • POST /add-team
  • Approve
    • POST /approve
  • Disable Account
    • POST /disable-account
  • All Kits
    • POST /kit/get-all-kits
  • Get Brains Details
    • POST /brains/get-all-brains
  • Get Brains List
    • POST /agents/get-brains-list
  • Get Company Details
    • POST /get-company-details
  • Get Insights List
    • POST /agents/get-insights-list
  • Get Page Description
    • POST /get-page-description?page=insights
  • Get Teams
    • POST /get-teams
  • Get User History
    • POST /get-user-history
  • Payments
    • POST /payment/get-all-plans
  • Upload Image
    • POST /upload-image
  • Change Password
    • POST /change-password
  • Generate API Key
    • POST /generate-api-key
  • Get Account Detail
    • GET /get-account
  • Get Profile
    • GET /get-profile
  • History
    • GET /history
  • Quota
    • GET /quota
  • Register
    • POST /register
  • Update Account Detail
    • POST /update-account
  • Update Profile
    • POST /update-profile
  • Upload Image
    • POST /upload

Lens Agent API:

  • Add Update Agent
    • POST /agents/add-update-agent
  • Get All Agents Analytics
    • GET /agents/get-agents-analytics
  • Get Agent Info
    • GET /agents/get-agents-info
  • Get All Agents
    • GET /agents/get-all-agents
  • Add and Update Domain
    • POST /agents/add-edit-brains
  • Agent Brain Selected
    • GET /agents/get-agent-brains-selected
  • Add and Update Data Relationship
    • POST /agents/add-edit-data-relation
  • Data Relationship
    • GET /agents/get-data-relation
  • Data Relationship Template
    • GET /agents/get-data-relation-template
  • Add and Update Insight
    • POST /agents/add-edit-insights
  • Agent Insights Selected
    • GET /agents/get-agent-insights-selected
  • Add and Update Domain
    • GET /agents/add-update-domains
    • POST /agents/add-update-domains
  • API Keys
    • GET /agents/get-api-keys
  • Whitelisted Domain
    • GET /agents/get-whitelist-domains
    • POST /agents/add-update-domains
  • Delete Agent
    • DEL /agents/delete-agent
  • Edit Agent Settings
    • POST /agents/edit-agent-settings
  • Agent Settings
    • GET /agents/get-agent-settings

Lens SDK:

  • Agent Brains
    • GET kit/brains
  • Agent Data Relation
    • GET kit/dataRelations
  • Agent Info
    • GET kit/analytics
  • Agent Insights
    • GET kit/insights
  • Meeting Kit
    • POST /kit/analyze

Feature Request Template¶

Name

About

title

Label

Assignees

Feature request

Suggest an idea for this project

[FEATURE]

enhancement

Feature Description¶

Provide a clear and concise description of the feature you would like to request.

Use Case¶

Explain how this feature will improve the user experience or add value to the product.

Proposed Solution¶

Describe your proposed solution to the feature request. Include any relevant technical details, diagrams, or mockups.

Workflow Diagram¶

A detailed diagram of the solution implementation

Action Items¶

  • [ ] Possible action items

  • [x] Possible action items

Potential Challenges / Requirements¶

Highlight any potential challenges or roadblocks that could arise during the implementation of this feature.

Additional Notes¶

Include any additional notes, comments, or feedback related to this feature request.
